card_text: Reveal 1 card in your hand, and if you do, add 1 of the following cards from your Deck to your hand, then shuffle the revealed card into the Deck.$N●"ZW -" monster$N●"ZS -" monster$N●"Zexal" Spell/Trap$N●"Rank-Up-Magic" Spell$N●"Rank-Down-Magic" Spell$NYou can only activate 1 "Zexal Construction" per turn.
